price: 20. Dan datanglah dari ujung kota, seorang laki-laki*(718) dengan bergegas ia berkata, "Wahai kaumku! Ikutilah utusan-utusan itu.
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
footnotes: *718). Menurut mufassir, laki-laki tersebut bernama Habib An-Najjar.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
